Class Local

  • java.lang.Object
    • Local

  • public class Local
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to parse apiObj weather from Open Weather Map API for local weather
    Since:
    February 26, 2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Curtis Vermeeren
